branchCategory.name: ISE10, Digital Pressure Sensor, 1 Screen 1 Output with Analog, Compact
branchCategory.description: <p>ISE10 is a compact pressure sensor suitable for mounting in panels or tight spaces.  This sensor has an integrated alphanumeric LED display with red and green LED switch indicators.  Switch delay time is 2.5ms, while current consumption is 40mA.  ISE10 meets UL/CSA, CE and RoHS standards, and has an IP40 enclosure rating.</p>

breadCrumb.name: ISE10, Digital Pressure Sensor, 1 Screen 1 Output with Analog, Compact
